Body:
ana = inst.create_group('analyzer')
ana.attrs['NX_class'] = np.string_('NXcrystal')
attributes = ['d_spacing', 'nominal_energy', 'polar_angle',
    'polar_angle_offset']
values = [('analyzer' + x.replace('_', ' ').title().replace(' ', '')) for x in
    attributes]
units = ['anstrom', 'mev', 'degree', 'degree']
for att, value, unit in zip(attributes, values, units):
    dset = ana.create_dataset(att, (1,), 'float32')
    dset[0] = getattr(self, value)
    if not unit is None:
        dset.attrs['units'] = np.string_(unit)
dset = ana.create_dataset('type', data=np.array([np.string_(self.
    analyzerType)]))
dset = ana.create_dataset('analyzer_selection', (1,), 'int32', data=self.
    analyzerSelection)
